com.iland.core.web.rest.api

Interface SupportTicketResource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    @Path(value="/support")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
public interface SupportTicketResource
extends Serializable
    Support Ticket Resource v1 Interface.
    Author:
    Cory Snyder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SupportTicketAttachmentDetails addTicketAttachment(String orgUuid, int ticketId, SupportTicketAttachment attachment)
      Add an attachment to a support ticket.
      SupportTicketComment addTicketComment(String orgUuid, int ticketId, NewSupportTicketComment newComment)
      Add a comment to a support ticket.
      SupportTicket createSupportTicket(String orgUuid, NewSupportTicket newSupportTicket)
      Add a new support ticket.
      byte[] getTicketAttachment(String orgUuid, int ticketId, int attachmentId)
      Get the file attached to a support ticket.
      List<SupportTicketAttachmentDetails> getTicketAttachmentList(String orgUuid, int ticketId)
      Get a list of files attached to the support ticket.
      SupportTicket getTicketById(String orgUuid, int ticketId)
      Get a support ticket by its ID.

      Get all support tickets for an organization.
      SupportTicket updateSupportTicket(String orgUuid, int ticketId, SupportTicket supportTicket)
      Updates a support ticket.

    • Method Detail

      • createSupportTicket

        @POST
 @Path(value="/org/{orgUuid}/tickets")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
SupportTicket createSupportTicket(@PathParam(value="orgUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                                         String orgUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                                         NewSupportTicket newSupportTicket)
        Add a new support ticket.
        Parameters:
        orgUuid - uuid or org
        newSupportTicket - specification for adding a new support ticket
        Returns:
        details of new support request

      • updateSupportTicket

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/org/{orgUuid}/tickets/{ticketId}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
SupportTicket updateSupportTicket(@PathParam(value="orgUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                   String orgUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                   @PathParam(value="ticketId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                   int ticketId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                   SupportTicket supportTicket)
        Updates a support ticket. Note that all properties are read-only except for 'cc_email_addresses' and 'cc_emails_enabled'.
        Parameters:
        orgUuid - uuid or org
        ticketId - the id of the ticket to update
        supportTicket - updated support ticket
        Returns:
        details of the support ticket after the update

      • addTicketComment

        @POST
 @Path(value="/org/{orgUuid}/tickets/{ticketId}/comments")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
SupportTicketComment addTicketComment(@PathParam(value="orgUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 String orgUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 @PathParam(value="ticketId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 int ticketId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 NewSupportTicketComment newComment)
        Add a comment to a support ticket.
        Parameters:
        orgUuid - uuid or org
        newComment - specification for adding a new new support ticket comment
        ticketId - support request ID

      • getTicketById

        @GET
 @Path(value="/org/{orgUuid}/tickets/{ticketId}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
SupportTicket getTicketById(@PathParam(value="orgUuid")
                                                                                                                                                String orgUuid,
                                                                                                                                                @PathParam(value="ticketId")
                                                                                                                                                int ticketId)
        Get a support ticket by its ID.
        Parameters:
        orgUuid - uuid or org
        ticketId - support ticket id
        Returns:
        support request

      • getTicketsForOrg

        @GET
 @Path(value="/org/{orgUuid}/tickets")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
List<SupportTicket> getTicketsForOrg(@PathParam(value="orgUuid")
                                                                                                                                              String orgUuid,
                                                                                                                                              @QueryParam(value="offset")
                                                                                                                                              Integer offset,
                                                                                                                                              @QueryParam(value="limit")
                                                                                                                                              Integer limit,
                                                                                                                                              @QueryParam(value="search")
                                                                                                                                              String search)
        Get all support tickets for an organization.
        Parameters:
        orgUuid - uuid or org
        offset - the page number
        limit - the page size (maximum is 100)
        search - the search parameter
        Returns:
        support tickets

      • getTicketComments

        @GET
 @Path(value="/org/{orgUuid}/tickets/{ticketId}/comments")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
List<SupportTicketComment> getTicketComments(@PathParam(value="orgUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                          String orgUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                          @PathParam(value="ticketId")
                                                                                                                                                                          int ticketId)
        Get support ticket comments for a specified support ticket.
        Parameters:
        orgUuid - uuid or org
        ticketId - support request ID
        Returns:
        list of support request conversation replies

      • addTicketAttachment

        @POST
 @Path(value="/org/{orgUuid}/tickets/{ticketId}/attachments")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="multipart/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+form-data")
SupportTicketAttachmentDetails addTicketAttachment(@PathParam(value="orgUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    String orgUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    @PathParam(value="ticketId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    int ticketId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    SupportTicketAttachment attachment)
        Add an attachment to a support ticket.
        Parameters:
        orgUuid - uuid or org
        attachment - multipart form input
        ticketId - the support ticket ID to attach file to
        Returns:
        summary of attachment

      • getTicketAttachmentList

        @GET
 @Path(value="/org/{orgUuid}/tickets/{ticketId}/attachments")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
List<SupportTicketAttachmentDetails> getTicketAttachmentList(@PathParam(value="orgUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                             String orgUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                             @PathParam(value="ticketId")
                                                                                                                                                                                             int ticketId)
        Get a list of files attached to the support ticket.
        Parameters:
        orgUuid - organization uuid
        ticketId - support ticket ID
        Returns:
        summary of files attached to a support ticket

      • getTicketAttachment

        @GET
 @Path(value="/org/{orgUuid}/tickets/{ticketId}/attachments/{attachmentId}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+octet-stream")
byte[] getTicketAttachment(@PathParam(value="orgUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                  String orgUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                  @PathParam(value="ticketId")
                                                                                                                                                                                  int ticketId,
                                                                                                                                                                                  @PathParam(value="attachmentId")
                                                                                                                                                                                  int attachmentId)
        Get the file attached to a support ticket.
        Parameters:
        orgUuid - organization uuid
        ticketId - support ticket ID
        attachmentId - attachment ID
        Returns:
        file attached to a support request
